comment.author: 58531063@N02
comment._content: This photo was taken during the Depression and I bet shelter conditions have not changed since then. It may be just as crowded and no more welcoming today.

comment.author: 71354222@N08
comment._content:
Much better now . . . still not as good as it will be, but a residence for men on the way to self-sufficiency.

Now at 811 Maynard Av S, Seattle WA 98134
